Posts.EditableText:
I'm new to this, so I'll be quick...
How or where can I export my game as a .quest file, I need it to make it mobile version
I always get .aslx
Thanks
Posts.HTML:
I'm new to this, so I'll be quick...
How or where can I export my game as a .quest file, I need it to make it mobile version
I always get .aslx
Thanks

Posts.EditableText: When you choose tools --> publish from the editor menu, quest converts the .aslx to a .quest file.
Posts.HTML: When you choose tools --> publish from the editor menu, quest converts the .aslx to a .quest file.

Posts.EditableText: is that in the windows download version or the browser version?
Posts.HTML: is that in the windows download version or the browser version?
